**Tanu Sreedharan** is a dynamic public health professional and Master of Public Health Epidemiology candidate with extensive experience in community health. She has significant expertise working with children, youth and families in multiple capacities including program implementation, program evaluation, outreach, communication in multicultural populations, and data analysis.
